display_long_description:
Features:

**🔹 High-Resolution Passthrough**

Enjoy crystal-clear visuals of your Android device inside your Meta Quest headset with very low latency (40ms-90ms)

**🔹 Can be used with other apps/games**

 This app can be used in background with other app/games


**🔹 Full Control with Hand Gestures & Controllers**
[media]
Navigate and interact with your Android device using hand gestures or your Meta Quest controllers.

**🔹 Stereo Audio Support**

High-quality stereo audio with good studio quality bitrate


**🔹 Easy to connect**
[media]
Connect on the same network or internet without any custom setting 

**🔹 Secure Peer-to-Peer Connection**

Your data stays private with end-to-end peer-to-peer connections. No additional data is collected or stored.


[media]


For additional help you can reach out on discord :  https://discord.gg/99qgmSxUZ9




[media]
Requirements : Only Android OS 8 and above is currently supported

Enjoy crystal-clear visuals of your Android device inside your Meta Quest headset with very low latency (40ms-90ms)

**🔹 Can be used with other apps/games**

**🔹 Full Control with Hand Gestures & Controllers**
